description: A relaxing construction game about mining an industrial quantity of crystal gems. Use those gems to build new buildings and combine those gems to unlock even more buildings. These new buildings will increase your production and the complexity of your ever growing factory.

name: The Iron Union
description: Greetings tank commander,and welcome to the《The Iron Union》.In this game,you will prove yourself by using your tanks to break though the blockade,and eliminate all your enemy.

name: Each Other
description: In this new puzzle game, guide Edwin and Judy through an original story and many levels. And help them to avoid the eye of the supervisors and to escape from their orphanage for the least strange...

name: Trade and Magic
description: A humorous open-world, action-adventure fantasy with elements of RPG, crafting and store simulator, in stylized graphics, suitable for the whole family! Italian indie game under development, support the developer by buying the founder edition and receive customized Skins.

name: Dracula Defense!
description: Dracula Defense is a top down 2D tower defense game where the player will need to act strategically to survive an onslaught of enemies trying to attack a base.

name: Seven Spirits
description: The land needs a hero! Pick one among the most brave samurai (Earth, Wind, Water, Fire) and live the legend, fight the goons and find the Villain, the despicable Void Samurai that treatens the life of an entire empire.

name: EternaMine
description: Do you like clicker games but wish they had more of a "game" in them? Then EternaMine is for you. Mine, fight monsters, upgrade your gear, obtain rare items and mine some more in the massive follow-up to the popular title "Haste-Miner 2".

name: Rygrad
description: Be alive, get stronger, dominate.

name: Pumpkin Ripper
description: Pumpkin Reaper is a dark fantasy hack and slash game with fluid and dynamic combat. Play with the pumpkin ripper, annihilating everything in front of you. Use the scythe to slash all your enemies in an arena system, increasing your score with each attempt.

name: Super Crazy Chickens
description: Help this crazy team of chickens to get the mysterious green eggs while adding more and more members to the adventure. Discover all the secrets, challenge the fearsome bosses or simply create the best levels in Super Crazy Chickens.

name: Luminous Nights
description: Embark on an adventure inspired by popular Fantasy Action RPGs. Travel to different realms fighting monsters and gaining new abilities as you seek to bring back peace to the Luminous Realms.

name: Orbital Cargo Division
description: The crew of a cargo ship arrives at what appears to be an abandoned space station. Power appears to be there, but no one is responding to their radio messages. A pixel art point of click adventure with an exciting story and lots of humor.

name: Gods of Savvarah: Part 1
description: Gods of Savvarah is a visual novel with the philosophy of a classic fantasy RPG. Defeat enemies, explore countries, make friends, and find your place in Savvarah.

name: Super Cucumber
description: Super Cucumber is a 16-bit inspired action-adventure game filled with tight platforming, unlockable abilities and plenty of secrets to discover. Traverse more than six towers and overcome dozens of levels, fight your way past devious bosses and become the greatest Aardvark Superhero in the world!

name: Rayna Survivors
description: Rayna Survivors is an action roguelite game where you need to slay hordes of foes and face bosses to learn powerful skills to upgrade your character.

name: Cosmic Crashers
description: Fast paced, action packed ropguelite in space. Pilot your space ship to defeat waves of enemies, but be careful - they are coming for your station.

name: Cops N' Zombies
description: Cops N' Zombies is a multiplayer horror social deduction game. You and your police team are to investigate an area but one of you is secretly a zombie, whose goal is to kill everyone. You can find guns and defend yourselves, except the zombie is able to transform at will, so who do you trust?

name: We Might Die
description: Salvage Spaceships, Gear Up, Survive the Alien Swarm. Mech-based survival game set in deep space, where an alien swarm is quickly approaching your home ship. You and your team of robots will salvage procedurally-generated ships to gain the resources you need to escape the star system intact.

name: Looking Up I See Only a Ceiling
description: A short psychological adventure about a stressed girl who wants to explore her ceiling.

name: My Little Sister Fiona
description: My Little Sister Fiona is a short kinetic novel about a brother taking care of his reclusive little sister.

name: Fantasy of War
description: Fantasy Strategy RPG

name: Arcadie: Second-Born
description: In this interactive tale of love and war, carve a place for yourself in a world that has disregarded you for too long. Be the force of reason that your kingdom needs, or perpetuate its reputation as a force of destruction. Find love and weave friendships, or cast it away for the sake of retribution.

name: Outworld Patrol
description: Control a space rover as you jump to avoid obstacles on a horizontally scrolling landscape while shooting down alien ships that shoot missiles from above or charge you head on. A love letter to the first game I ever played on PC.

name: Temporian Tale
description: Follow Bravic on his quest to free the land from a demon's corruption in this action-adventure game.

name: Viking Heroes 3
description: The Vikings need help! It’s up to you to unite with the Vikings and help them complete a grand journey across many different worlds and landscapes in an effort to restore the rainbow bridge and stop the collision of all the worlds!

name: Ranger Danger
description: A park ranger's life is changed forever as they discover what really lurks in their national park. A first-person horror, exploration, and stealth-based game.

name: Royal Romances: Battle of the Woods - Collector's Edition
description: It's time to make your choice! Experience a new fantasy world, full of adventure and romance! Go through the first four episodes of the story and wait for more games!

name: Lucky Island
description: Lucky Island is a light Rogue deck-building game that combines island construction and management with slot machine mechanics. It features a charming pixel art style that creates a relaxing and refreshing environment for players to create their own unique islands.

name: Limerick: Cadence Mansion
description: Limerick: Cadence Mansion is a detail-rich first-person thriller-adventure with deep lore, intricate puzzles, satisfying stealth-action gameplay, and a happy little marionette who really wants to say "hello."

name: Cividle
description: CivIdle is an idle/incremental game that allows you to lead your own civilization through thousands of years from ancient times to the modern era. Expand your territory, explore a vast tech tree, build various wonders, and trade with global players: empire must grow and numbers must go up!

name: After Dark
description: Get into an alternative world in which an unknown catastrophe occurred, which led to the complete disappearance of mankind. Find out the cause of what happened and most importantly, try to survive, because you are far from alone in this world.

name: Voice over
description: "Voice over" is a visual novel about millionaire Thomas and a maniac terrorizing the city, made by a girl with bipolar disorder.

name: Crane Game Simulator
description: Play all your favorite claw machines! Features fully simulated physics for a fun and fair experience! Win and collect all prizes. Use these prizes in the photo mode and unleash your creative side!

name: Artifice: War Tactics
description: Artifice: War tactics is a turn-based strategy all about setting up tripwires and executing killer combos! A game of anticipation, deduction and outwitting your enemy at every turn. Play as one of four kingdoms in an epic campaign for territory, champions, relics and the throne of the Immortal king.

name: Reflexia Prototype ver.
description: Reflexia's story starts out as a parody of its genre and ends as a psychological drama.

name: Mega Serval
description: Serval's friends are in danger and it's up to her to save the day! Progress through 12 action-packed platforming stages in this "Kemono Friends Project" derivative work!

name: The Outer Space Bugs
description: Exterminate the bugs that are hidden on the dark side of the moon. A game based on space exploration, with a variety of items and monsters and a evil to be defeated. Adventure in this space experience and destroy them.

name: Miszou
description: Relax, Chill or Strive with Lofi in the world of Miszou, a 2.5d Rollerblading Platformer. Customize and make your way through the 4 unique Turtles of Miszou in whatever clothing or skating style that suits you.

name: Water Search
description: Water Search - Top Down Shooter, in this game you need to destroy all those who have deprived access to water. Use melee and ranged combat to deal with the problem. Enemies are not so simple, you need to be extremely accurate and dexterous.

name: Hotel Story
description: Start your Life in Odd Town to build up a Hotel of your Dream´s from dusty and broken to shiny and luxurious. Explore a vast modern City and it´s surrounding Land with unique resident´s and strange twist´s. Collect all Furniture to get the Guest attention!

name: Monster Knockout
description: An ever present threat has emerged from the darkness, it is up to you to travel through monster filled galaxies and defeat every single foe in your path. Choose from a range of super upgradeable bird nodes that allow you to unleash multiple attacks on any enemy

name: Americas Tower Simulator
description: Manage, control and guarantee the safety of all your flights in Torre Las Américas, a simulator based on real air traffic controller procedures, which will put you to the test through the different challenges that the guardians of the sky experience every day.

name: Schrodinger's Code
description: Schrodinger’s Code is a puzzle game where you need to fix Thomas Schrodinger's messy code before he gets trapped forever inside his own game.

name: Skellington
description: A 3D-Platformer collectathon! Run, jump, crawl, bounce and stomp your way through halloween themed levels!

name: Anime Catgirl Runner
description: Anime Catgirl Runner is a 2D Endless Runner Game, where you take the role of a cute Catgirl!

name: The Reaper Survivors
description: The Reaper Survivors – 2D roguelike combined with some RPG elements that takes place in the gothic world. As a reaper of death, you have to fight hordes of dark forces.

name: Scurvy Dogs
description: An online Player v Player battle!

name: The Rules
description: In this first-person horror survival game, you must Follow the Rules, keep a clear head, and be attentive. Only then may you live to see the end of the night. Relying on ambient horror and speech recognition to keep the player on their toes, this is a horror game like you've never played before.

name: Perry the Pumpkin
description: Perry the Pumpkin needs to save Halloween! In this epic platformer with RPG elements, you will learn secrets about the mayhem surrounding the spookiest of holidays. Perry will spit out pumpkin seeds to stop enemies and learn new abilities to help him with his mission.

name: Rage Night
description: Earth has been chosen to host this season of RAGE NIGHT! Earth's greatest fighters past and future battle it out for the opportunity to be Rage Night Champion! Experience real-time PVP Cinematic Fighting, Simplified-Controls, Free-to-Play. Get ready to Rage!

name: Once Upon A Siege
description: A Sci Fi VR Tower Defence Game. Upgrade & Manage - Defend & Rebuild - Endure.

name: Remote Planets
description:
A journey through a vibrant alien world filled with unique box-pushing puzzles.

Explore the open world, solve logic challenges using unique mechanics and help the friendly cast of villagers restore power to their home. Reshape the level space with the help of mysterious alien technology.

name: Clockwork Owl
description: Clockwork Owl is a battle-sim rogue-lite that utilizes coin-pushing mechanics as a means to defend your tower against increasingly challenging waves of enemies. Push cogs off the edge to drop them on your enemies heads! Unlock new cogs with unique abilities and upgrade your owl to survive.

name: Dahliphoria
description: When the player comes across a bridge in the darkened forest, they have an option to either cross it or turn back. A cryptic romance-horror creepypasta-esque game with many hidden layers and a story to piece together, recommended for a community to solve.

name: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka
description: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat There is No Vadimka is an action platformer with survival horror elements, created by VadimBallzGames released on January 5, 2023, for Windows. In this sixth installment of the Super Vadimka series, players follow the exploits of Vadim Kulev, an infamous figure from Velizh who has gained legendary status. The game boasts a retro 16-bit aesthetic reminiscent of SNES classics, featuring around 100 levels filled with challenging, bloodthirsty bosses that embody the disturbing Kulechkophobia virus that plagues the protagonist.

name: Aden
description: Dance! Dance! There's nothing to do but dance! A kawaii belt-scrolling dance battle for the new age! You save the world from destruction by controlling the mysterious girl and Akaka who appeared from the sky!

name: Dusk Pub
description: As the manager of Dusk Pub, you have to put in a lot of efforts to run your own worn-down bar and expand your business to other parts of the land Brent. Meet a variety of cute girls and recruit them as servers, helping them develop their business talent and know them inside out.

name: Fair Princess Under Futa Curse
description: Play as a beautiful princess who was cursed by an evil witch to become a futanari. Explore her sexual transformation in this non-linear life simulation visual novel where you get to choose which actions the princess takes. You are in charge of her sexual exploration and sluttyness.

name: I.H.A.S
description: Experience story in this FPS Psychological game, shoot at futuristic robots or use your stealth skills to escape, explore and travel between different worlds using portals and find yourself

name: Sweety Kitty 2
description: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Romancing the Kingdom
description: Choose your path through this graphic novel with dozens of erotic outcomes along the way. Save your progress and unlock the graphic and erotic chapters with your choices.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 10
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Candy Maid
description: Candy Maid is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: The Heart Defenders
description: Building defender 2D strategy game! Place building and gather resources. Use the resources you collect to then build towers that will defend your heart in the middle of the map. Survive as many levels as you can manage! Good luck!

name: Lost Memories
description: Lost Memories is a horror adventure where the player is to uncover the mystery of where they are and why they are doing this. Once the player beats the game they will uncover why they are in a jumbled game where it may seem like it doesn't make sense. Hince where the game name came from.

name: Orestorm Factory
description: Orestorm Factory is a BulletHell Roguelike where you must build a factory of drills and processors to loot a cave, and dodge your way past enemies and your own deadly machinery along the way.

name: Voyna
description: So you think you’re the chosen one, do you? The one to finally find the Vuadzha and put an end to millennia of Virtual Holy Wars? What breathtaking arrogance! Typical Steam gamer. Although… come closer, human. Hmmm. Maybe. Just maybe. It could be you. Shall we find out?

name: Ocean Is Home
description: Ocean is Home is an island life simulator and an open world adventure rolled into one. Starting with a small house and an old pickup truck, you can build an estate and become a significant person in a warm tropical paradise.

name: Project: Waterfall
description: Welcome to the game Project: Waterfall! Here you are the protagonist who draws lines to the heart of cute and beautiful girls in a fantasy world. Pass a lot of levels and get a hundred achievements. Have fun playing!

name: Born in Blood
description: Dont just survive a zombie apocalypse, thrive in it! Blast hordes of Zeds as you gain experience and cash to buy better gear and see how long you can survive.

name: Energy Survivors
description: Energy Survivors is a third-person shooter roguelite where you play as a space soldier. Invade a hostile planet in search of its energy source. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds.

name: The Mighty Eighth VR
description: The Mighty 8th VR puts you in the shoes of a B-17 Flying Fortress crew member at the height of the Strategic Bombing Campaign over Europe. Partner up with friends and do your part to ensure that the plane reaches the target and returns home safely.

name: Iron Frontier
description: Roguelike card strategy game. Establish your base and fight against hordes of enemies. Experiment with units, buildings and upgrades. Find the best tactics to overcome the onslaught!
